textContent:
I've said over and over again how important it is to take the path of least resistance to follow the energy Wu way do without trying. 

Ending our marriage was taking all of my effort and when I suddenly realized I'm the problem, the energy and effort disappears. 

Metaphorically this is actually really interesting. This has been a 9-month birthing process and I feel like I'm at that moment of going into labor. Just like the birthing process with Ben. It was mainly alone. But at the end of it there's an opportunity to come together around something much bigger than ourselves.
title: Reflections on marriage
textContentHtml:
I've said over and over again how important it is to take the path of least resistance to follow the energy Wu way do without trying. 


Ending our marriage was taking all of my effort and when I suddenly realized I'm the problem, the energy and effort disappears. 


Metaphorically this is actually really interesting. This has been a 9-month birthing process and I feel like I'm at that moment of going into labor. Just like the birthing process with Ben. It was mainly alone. But at the end of it there's an opportunity to come together around something much bigger than ourselves.
